import styles from "./Categories.module.css"; import { useCountdown } from "../../hooks/useCountdown"; const THREE_DAYS_IN_MS = 3 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000; const NOW_IN_MS = new Date().getTime(); const dateTimeAfterThreeDays = NOW_IN_MS + THREE_DAYS_IN_MS; export default function Categories() { const [disabled, setDisabled] = useState(false); const CountdownTimer = ({ targetDate }) => { const [days, hours, minutes, seconds] = useCountdown(targetDate); if (days + hours + minutes + seconds <= 0) { setDisabled(true); return
Promotion is expired
